H0.text: In the 2014-15 season which premiership team’s stadium had the smallest capacity. Burnley

H1.text: In the 2014-15 season which premiership team’s stadium had the smallest capacity. Swansea City

H2.text: In the 2014-15 season which premiership team’s stadium had the smallest capacity. Stoke City

H3.text: In the 2014-15 season which premiership team’s stadium had the smallest capacity. QPR

A5.text: The stadium is the home of EFL Championship club Swansea City, who took full operational control of the stadium in 2018

A6.text: Stoke City's stadium had a capacity of 27,500 before expansion in 2017
